title: WWE® All Stars™
description: The multiplayer functionality of this title is no longer available.  You will only have access to the single player aspects of the game after download. The Games on Demand version supports  English, French, Italian, German, Spanish.  The greatest WWE match ups haven't happened - Until now.  WWE All Stars is packed with high-flying, hard hitting and over the top action featuring 30 WWE historic Legends and current Superstars.

childDownloads.title: All Stars Pyro Entrance
childDownloads.description: Make an entrance like no other!  When you enter the ring, everyone will know as you make a classic WWE entrance complete with pyro effects!

childDownloads.title: Bret Hart Outfit
childDownloads.description: Nobody knew how to break hearts like the Hit Man himself.  Download this outfit featuring Bret Hart's signature pink sunglasses, leather jacket, ring attire, knee pads, and boots

childDownloads.title: Million Dollar Pack
childDownloads.description: Everybody’s got a price! Download the Million Dollar Pack and bring one of the greatest father and son pairings in WWE history to WWE All Stars! The Million Dollar Pack includes two bonus downloadable characters for your roster: WWE Legend and Hall of Famer, the Million Dollar Man and his son, current RAW Superstar, Ted DiBiase.

childDownloads.title: WWE® All Stars™
childDownloads.description: The multiplayer functionality of this title is no longer available.  You will only have access to the single player aspects of the game after download. The Games on Demand version supports  English, French, Italian, German, Spanish.  The greatest WWE match ups haven't happened - Until now.  WWE All Stars is packed with high-flying, hard hitting and over the top action featuring 30 WWE historic Legends and current Superstars.

childDownloads.title: All-Time Greats Pack
childDownloads.description: What a rush! Download this pack to add some of the greatest Superstars of all-time to WWE All Stars. This pack features Hawk and Animal, the legendary Road Warriors, Chris Jericho, and Jerry ‘The King’ Lawler!

childDownloads.title: WWE All Stars: American Dream Pack
childDownloads.description: Get funky like a monkey if you will and download the American Dream Pack, featuring 2 new downloadable characters for WWE All Stars: WWE Hall of Famer Dusty Rhodes and his son, “Dashing” Cody Rhodes.

childDownloads.title: WWE All Stars: Compatibility Pack 1 featuring Honky Tonk Man
childDownloads.description: Don’t be cruel! Download and play as the Greatest Intercontinental Champion of all-time, the Honky Tonky Man, in WWE All Stars!  Please Note: This pack also contains a compatibility update. Please download prior to playing WWE All Stars multiplayer on Xbox LIVE.

childDownloads.title: Compatibility Pack 2 featuring R-Truth
childDownloads.description: What’s up? It’s R-Truth!  Download now to add one of WWE’s premier rising stars to WWE All Stars.  Please Note: This pack also contains a compatibility update. Please download prior to playing WWE All Stars multiplayer on Xbox LIVE.

childDownloads.title: WWE All Stars Demo
childDownloads.description: The greatest WWE match-ups haven't happened - Until now.  WWE All Stars is packed with high-flying, hard hitting and over the top action featuring 30 WWE historic Legends and current Superstars. Play as Rey Mysterio or the Ultimate Warrior in this action-packed demo.

childDownloads.title: Southern Charisma Pack
childDownloads.description: Have you ever taken a trip down to Cobb County, Georgia? How about Badstreet, Atlanta G.A? Some of the greatest Superstars in WWE history have called the South ‘home’. Download this pack to play as – ‘The Fabulous Freebird’, Michael Hayes, ‘The World’s Strongest Man’, Mark Henry, and the Big Boss Man!

childDownloads.title: WWE All Stars Trailer
childDownloads.description: WWE All Stars will deliver one of the greatest rosters ever assembled in a wrestling-centric videogame.  Renowned WWE Legends will align with today’s most prominent WWE Superstars, inviting players to generate fantasy matches and ultimately determine the greatest competitors of all time.  In addition, each WWE Legend and WWE Superstar will boast a distinctive and highly stylized appearance, adding to the overall atmosphere and intrepid attitude exuding from the on-screen action.   WWE All Stars will encompass a fluid, intuitive and original gameplay style, creating a highly competitive environment and an engaging spectacle.  Packed with high-flying, hard hitting and over the top action, players will explore a variety of responsive quick grapples, strong grapples, standing and running attacks, as well as combination sequences.  Every WWE Legend and WWE Superstar on the power-packed roster will be equipped with individual abilities, signature moves and renowned finishers to create the ultimate in-ring experience.

childDownloads.title: WWE All Stars T-Shirt
childDownloads.description: Show your WWE All Stars pride with this T-Shirt.
